mn116:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati isigilismiṃ pabbate.
mn116:4.1: “Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ vebhāraṃ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:4.3: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vebhārassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:5.1: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ paṇḍavaṃ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:5.3: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, paṇḍavassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:6.1: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ vepullaṃ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:6.3: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vepullassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:7.1: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:7.3: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, gijjhakūṭassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:8.1: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, imaṃ isigiliṃ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:8.3: Imassa kho pana, bhikkhave, isigilissa pabbatassa esāva samaññā ahosi esā paññatti.
mn116:9.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsino ahesuṃ.
mn116:9.2: Te imaṃ pabbataṃ pavisantā dissanti, paviṭṭhā na dissanti.
mn116:9.9: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn116:9.10: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
mn116:10.1: “Ariṭṭho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:10.2: upariṭṭho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:10.3: tagarasikhī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:10.4: yasassī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:10.5: sudassano nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:10.6: piyadassī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:10.7: gandhāro nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:10.8: piṇḍolo nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:10.9: upāsabho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:10.10: nīto nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:10.11: tatho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi, sutavā nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:10.12: bhāvitatto nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi.
mn116:15.2: Aṅgo ca paṅgo ca guttijito ca;
